message.content: {"id": "6536", "title": "Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing", "description": "", "OB": "When trying to add Javadoc on a field in the TH, the expected behavior is that the Javadoc is successfully added to the field.", "EB": "Currently, when selecting \"Add Javadoc\" from the context menu, nothing happens. This is not the expected behavior. The action should add the Javadoc to the field.", "SR": "To resolve this issue, either remove the \"Add Javadoc\" option from the context menu or fix the functionality so that it successfully adds Javadoc to the field when selected."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
